SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.ui.gui.FXController

Class GameViewController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ui.gui.FXController.GUIScene
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ui.gui.FXController.GameViewController
public class GameViewController extends GUIScene
GameViewController handles the interface that allows the GUI player to play the game. It contains the actual board, a simple scoreboard, the inventory, the drawable cards, the player's cards and the goals.

    • addPlaceHolders

      public void addPlaceHolders(CardLocation cl, Set<CardLocation> seen)
      Recursively adds all needed placeholders (button that can be clicked to place a card in the matching location).
      Parameters:
      cl - location where the check needs to start
      seen - an empty HashSet used to keep track of visited cards

    • addPlaceCardButton

      public void addPlaceCardButton(CardLocation cl)
      Allows to add a single placeholder (place card button).
      Parameters:
      cl - location where the button needs to be placed

    • flipCard

      public void flipCard(int i)
      Graphically flips the card whose index is provided.
      Parameters:
      i - index of the card that needs to be flipped

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the interface content
      Specified by:
      update in class GUIScene

    • showScoreboard

      public void showScoreboard()
      Display the "extended" scoreboard as a pop-up window

    • viewPlayer1

      public void viewPlayer1()
      Triggered when the user clicks on the button containing the first player's nickname. It displays the first player's board (cards, inventory)

    • viewPlayer2

      public void viewPlayer2()
      Triggered when the user clicks on the button containing the second player's nickname. It displays the first player's board (cards, inventory)

    • viewPlayer3

      public void viewPlayer3()
      Triggered when the user clicks on the button containing the third player's nickname. It displays the first player's board (cards, inventory)

    • viewPlayer4

      public void viewPlayer4()
      Triggered when the user clicks on the button containing the forth player's nickname. It displays the first player's board (cards, inventory)

    • centerScrollPane

      public void centerScrollPane()
      Triggered when the "center scrollpane" button is clicked. Centers the scroll pane (where the board is displayed)

    • leaveGame

      public void leaveGame()
      Triggered when the "leave game" button is clicked. It sends a message to the server that inform it that the player's leaving and return to the main screen, resetting the local view (model).
